statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); agent=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.agent // empty'); if [ -n "$agent" ] && [ "$agent" != "null" ]; then agent_info=" $(tput setaf 5)[@${agent}]$(tput sgr0)"; else agent_info=""; fi; branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=" $(tput setaf 3)(${branch})$(tput sgr0)"; else git_info=""; fi; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); bar_filled=$((pct / 10)); bar_empty=$((10 - bar_filled)); context_bar=$(printf '%.0s=' $(seq 1 $bar_filled))$(printf '%.0s-' $(seq 1 $bar_empty)); if [ $pct -gt 80 ]; then clr=1; elif [ $pct -gt 50 ]; then clr=3; else clr=2; fi; context_info=" $(tput setaf $clr)[${context_bar} ${pct}%]$(tput sgr0)"; else context_info=""; fi; echo "$(tput setaf 5)[${model}]$(tput sgr0)${agent_info} $(tput setaf 2)$(whoami)@$(hostname -s)$(tput sgr0):$(tput setaf 4)$(pwd)$(tput sgr0)${git_info}${context_info}"
